v-model:show.description: Whether or not to display a bubble pop-out layer

actions-direction.description: The direction in which the picklist is arranged, with the optional value being horizontal
actions-direction.description_zh: 选项列表的排列方向，可选值为 horizontal

theme.description_zh: 主题风格，可选值为 dark

trigger.description: Trigger mode, the optional value is manual
trigger.description_zh: 触发方式，可选值为 manual

duration.description: Animation duration, in seconds, is set to 0 to disable animation
duration.description_zh: 动画时长，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

:offset.description: The offset of the occurrence position

overlay.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

overlay-class.description: Customize the mask layer class name

show-arrow.description: Whether or not to display small arrows

close-on-click-action.description: Whether or not to turn off after clicking on the option
close-on-click-action.description_zh: 是否在点击选项后关闭

close-on-click-outside.description: Whether or not to close the menu after clicking on an external element
close-on-click-outside.description_zh: 是否在点击外部元素后关闭菜单

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to close the menu after clicking on the mask layer
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否在点击遮罩层后关闭菜单

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

icon-prefix.description: Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the [class-prefix property](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component
icon-prefix.description_zh: 图标类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

PopoverAction.name: icon
PopoverAction.description: 文字左侧的图标，支持传入图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

PopoverAction.name: className
PopoverAction.description: 为对应选项添加额外的类名

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when you click on an option

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the menu is opened

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the menu is closed

events.name: opened
events.description: The menu opens and triggers when the animation ends
events.description_zh: 打开菜单且动画结束后触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Close the menu and trigger after the animation ends
events.description_zh: 关闭菜单且动画结束后触发

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked

slots.name: reference
slots.description: The content of the element that triggers the popover display
slots.description_zh: 触发 Popover 显示的元素内容
